projects.name: Core Website Development (blox.xyz)
highlights: Developed and enhanced the blox website by building high-performance, responsive UI components for Homepage and Property Detail Pages (PDP)
Led major performance optimization initiatives, improving Core Web Vitals by reducing LCP from 8s to 3.5s and achieving CLS < 0.1 across key pages
Redesigned the PDP gallery by replacing a legacy carousel with a performance-optimized layout, bringing LCP under 2.5 seconds
Integrated rich media features including YouTube Shorts and property videos with interactive actions (like, save)
Revamped homepage property sections and integrated Blogs and Press Mentions to improve content discoverability and SEO visibility
Implemented interactive tools such as an EMI Calculator and enhanced search page filters

projects.name: Campaign Microsites Development
highlights: Developed and delivered 20+ campaign microsites with responsive layouts and reusable UI components
Implemented performance-first development practices across microsites with fast load times and cross-browser compatibility
Collaborated with design and marketing teams to translate requirements into pixel-perfect, production-ready interfaces
Optimized asset loading and component rendering to improve user engagement
Ensured consistent branding, accessibility, and code quality by following modern frontend best practices

projects.name: Performance Optimization (Core Web Vitals)
highlights: Led end-to-end Core Web Vitals optimization across all user journeys, driving site-wide performance and UX improvements
Identified and resolved Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) issues by refactoring unstable rendering logic
Improved Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) by replacing legacy components with performance-optimized layouts
Reduced PDP load time from 8 seconds to 3.5 seconds through optimized asset delivery and lazy loading
Optimized homepage performance while supporting rich media and video integrations
Monitored performance using Lighthouse and browser tooling to maintain compliance with Google Core Web Vitals standards
